title: Enhancing Visual Literacy in the Digital Age: Developing Expert Competencies Through Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool competency and basic grasp of specialized domains (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating practical skills for interpreting/analyzing visual materials in VR simulation environments, targeting entry-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can interpret specialized visual materials (e.g., medical images, legal evidence, technical diagrams) with 80% accuracy.
Learners successfully perform problem-solving scenarios using digital images/videos in VR environments at least three times.
Learners can apply a three-stage analysis framework (context-structure-meaning) to evaluate the reliability of visual materials and write reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
